headline: Hyperscaler GenAI Gets Cheaper As Pricing Finds Its Level
summary: There are no "comps" in the GenAI universe - this is a new market, and cloud providers eager to justify their AI investments have little to go on when setting prices for their platforms.

raw.headline: Hyperscaler GenAI Gets Cheaper As Pricing Finds Its Level
